name: Blaze-Dash
description:
Blaze-Dash is a fast paced head to head arcade style game about dashing through a grid based level, covering the ground with as much as your colour as you can, while covering as much as your opponents color.

P1: WASD  / (A or D to confirm in menu)

P2: Arrow Keys / D-Pad/Analogue Stick on 360 Controller

---

Dev/Art - @GrogDev

Music -  @FailPositive (SoundCloud link to games soundtrack!)
